seller.title: Add parcel — get payment link
seller.description1: Enter parcel details — we verify the parcel exists.
seller.description2: Once they pay, you're good to ship the parcel.

recipient.title: Pay safely before shipping
recipient.description1: You get a secure payment link from the sender.
recipient.description2: Pay upfront — we hold the funds until the parcel is collected.

seller.title: They pay — you ship
seller.description1: The recipient pays via the secure link and you see the payment in the app
seller.description2: After payment, ship the parcel — funds are held securely until delivery.

recipient.title: Sender ships after you pay
recipient.description1: Once you pay, the sender is notified.
recipient.description2: They ship the parcel — you can track the status.

seller.title: Parcel picked up — you get paid
seller.description1: When the parcel is picked up, we confirm delivery.
seller.description2: Funds are released to you — ensuring a secure transaction.

recipient.title: Pick up — or get refunded
recipient.description1: The sender gets paid only after you collect the parcel.
recipient.description2: If anything goes wrong, we’ll refund your payment.

shipment.shareText: Your package is ready for delivery. TTN: {{ ttn }}

withdraw.bottomAlertDescription: Your funds may be lost if you send them to a different network
withdraw.errorAmountNotANumber: The amount must be a number
withdraw.errorAmountLessFee: The withdrawal amount does not cover the commission";
withdraw.errorAmountMinValue: The withdrawal amount must be greater {{fee}}
withdraw.errorAmountExceedsBalance: Withdraw amount cannot be greater than balance

payment.paymentDescription: The amount is frozen and will be transferred to the sender only after your confirmation of receipt.

sendPackage.createEmptyDescription: Specify the amount the recipient must pay. The fee will be deducted upon receipt — you will receive the amount minus the fee after the delivery is confirmed.
sendPackage.createFullfiledDescription: The recipient will pay this amount. After deducting the fee, you will receive approximately ${{fee}}.
sendPackage.sendDescription: Share this link with the buyer
sendPackage.ttnError: The number was not found in the system or has already been registered.
